text:
It's possible to add EventListener on each element or the root element only. 
MouseEvents will then be dispatched properly to the coresponding element.

JSVGCanvas fowards all AWT MouseEvent to the Element in the DOM tree through 
the use of org.w3c.dom.events.MouseEvent.

Use the addEventListener("click", listener, false) method for instance on an 
element to attach a listener that will be triggered on a 'click'
